<title level="1" right="Rules">[Spellcaster](/Rules.aspx?ID=1353)</title>

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 195

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An apprentice spellcaster is trained in the appropriate magic tradition and gains two cantrips from their class. A prepared caster can’t change these cantrips each day.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
